resources.string: Hull Health is increased for all ships.
Increases the Damage dealt to Hostiles patrolling space.
Unlocks the Orion Corvette, a Grade 1 Battleship.
Your ships take less Damage from Hostiles patrolling space.
+100% bonus to base Weapon Damage for all ships.
Shield Health is increased for all ships.
Shield Deflection is increased for all ships.
Armor is increased for all ships.
Dodge value is increased for all ships.
Grant 5 Blueprints each of Phindra, Turas and Talla.
+100% to base HullHealth for all ships.
Unlocks the Phindra, a Gradle 2 Interceptor.
+100% to base Shield Health for all ships.

Unlocks the Turas, a Gradle 2 Explorer.

Shield Health is increased for all Survey ships.
Unlocks the Talla, a Grade 2 Battleship.
All Kinetic Weapons do increased damage.
All Energy Weapons do increased damage.
Dodge is increased for all Interceptors.
Shield Deflection is increased for all Explorers.
Armor is increased for all Battleships.

Grants 10 Blueprints each for Kehra, Vahklas and Kumari.

Unlocks the Kehra, a Gradle 3 Interceptor.
+100% to base Accuracy, Shield and Armor Piercing for all ships.
Hull Health is increased for all Interceptors.
Damage done to Hostiles is increased for all Interceptors.

Unlocks the Vahklas, a Grade 3 Explorer.

Unlocks the Kumari, a Grade 3 Battleship.
Hull Health is increased for all Battleships.
Damage done to Hostiles is increased for all Battleships.
Shield Health is increased for all Battleships.
Shield Penetration is increased for all Battleships.

Increases Accuracy, Armor Piercing and Shield Piercing against Stations.
Weapon Damage is increased against Romulan ships.
Weapon Damage is increased against Klingon ships.
Weapon Damage is increased against Federation ships.
Weapon Damage is increased when attacking Stations.
Requirement for the construction of all Grade 4 Ships.

Build Speed is increased for all buildings.
Parsteel Generators provide resources at increased speed.
A new Drydock is available for construction at each level.
Storage size is increased for the Parsteel Warehouse.
Tritanium Generators provide resources at increased speed.
+100% to all base Resource Generation speed.
Storage size is increased for the Tritanium Warehouse.
Unlocks the Fortunate, a Grade 1 Survey Ship.
Increases the repair speed for all ships.
Unlocks the Astronautics Studio, a building used for Research.
+100% to base Construction Speed for all buildings.
Unlocks the Refinery building, for Refining Materials.
Dilithium Generators provide resources at increased speed.
Storage size is increased for the Dilithium Warehouse.
Increased Shield Deflection, Armor and Dodge at the Station.
Repair Speed for Interceptors is increased.
A new Defense Platform is available for construction at each level.
Increases the cost efficiency of Research for Parsteel, Tritanium and Dilithium.
Repair Speed for Explorers is increased.
Unlocks the Vault building to protect your resources.
Shield Health for all Defense Platforms is increased.
Repair Speed for Battleships is increased.
Unlocks the Envoy, a Grade 2 Survey Ship.
The Hull Health for all Defense Platforms is increased.
Unlocks the Ship Hangar building for construction.
The Weapon Damage for all Defense Platforms is increased.
Increases the cost efficiency of all buildings for Parsteel, Tritanium and Dilithium.
+100% to base Repair Speed for all ships.
+100% to base Cost Efficiency for repairing ships.

Unlocks the Armada Control Center building.

Unlocks the Engine Technology Lab building.
Increases the Speed of Tiering Up a Ship.
Increases the Accuracy of all Defense Platforms.
Increases the Shield Piercing of all Defense Platforms.
Increases the Armor Piercing of all Defense Platforms.

Parsteel Generation speed is increased for all Generators.
Tritanium Generation speed is increased for all Generators.
Dilithium Generation speed is increased for all Generators.

Tritanium Generators can keep more Tritanium.
Dilithium Generators can keep more Dilithium.

Warp Speed for all ships is increased.
